1//

5//
6// DeferGlobalInitializers is an AST traverser that moves global initializers into a separate
7// function that is called in the beginning of main(). This enables initialization of globals with
8// uniforms or non-constant globals, as allowed by the WebGL spec. Some initializers referencing
9// non-constants may need to be unfolded into if statements in HLSL - this kind of steps should be
10// done after DeferGlobalInitializers is run. Note that it's important that the function definition
11// is at the end of the shader, as some globals may be declared after main().
12//
13// It can also initialize all uninitialized globals.
14//
15
16#include "compiler/translator/tree_ops/DeferGlobalInitializers.h"
17
18#include <vector>
19
20#include "compiler/translator/Compiler.h"
21#include "compiler/translator/IntermNode.h"
22#include "compiler/translator/StaticType.h"
23#include "compiler/translator/SymbolTable.h"
24#include "compiler/translator/tree_ops/InitializeVariables.h"
25#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/FindMain.h"
26#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermNode_util.h"
27#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/ReplaceVariable.h"
28
29namespace sh
30{
31
32namespace
33{
34
35constexpr const ImmutableString kInitGlobalsString("initGlobals");
36
37void GetDeferredInitializers(TIntermDeclaration *declaration,
38 bool initializeUninitializedGlobals,
39 bool canUseLoopsToInitialize,
40 bool highPrecisionSupported,
41 TIntermSequence *deferredInitializersOut,
42 std::vector<const TVariable *> *variablesToReplaceOut,
43 TSymbolTable *symbolTable)
44{
45 // SeparateDeclarations should have already been run.
46 ASSERT(declaration->getSequence()->size() == 1);
47
48 TIntermNode *declarator = declaration->getSequence()->back();
49 TIntermBinary *init = declarator->getAsBinaryNode();
50 if (init)
51 {
52 TIntermSymbol *symbolNode = init->getLeft()->getAsSymbolNode();
53 ASSERT(symbolNode);
54 TIntermTyped *expression = init->getRight();
55
56 if (expression->getQualifier() != EvqConst || !expression->hasConstantValue() ||
57 symbolNode->getQualifier() == EvqGlobal)
58 {
59 // For variables which are not constant, defer their real initialization until
60 // after we initialize uniforms.
61 // Deferral is done also in any cases where the variable can not be converted to a
62 // constant union, since otherwise there's a chance that HLSL output will generate extra
63 // statements from the initializer expression.
64
65 // Change const global to a regular global if its initialization is deferred.
66 // This can happen if ANGLE has not been able to fold the constant expression used
67 // as an initializer.
68 ASSERT(symbolNode->getQualifier() == EvqConst ||
69 symbolNode->getQualifier() == EvqGlobal);
70 if (symbolNode->getQualifier() == EvqConst)
71 {
72 variablesToReplaceOut->push_back(&symbolNode->variable());
73 }
74
75 TIntermBinary *deferredInit =
76 new TIntermBinary(EOpAssign, symbolNode->deepCopy(), init->getRight());
77 deferredInitializersOut->push_back(deferredInit);
78
79 // Remove the initializer from the global scope and just declare the global instead.
80 declaration->replaceChildNode(init, symbolNode);
81 }
82 }
83 else if (initializeUninitializedGlobals)
84 {
85 TIntermSymbol *symbolNode = declarator->getAsSymbolNode();
86 ASSERT(symbolNode);
87
88 // Ignore ANGLE internal variables and nameless declarations.
89 if (symbolNode->variable().symbolType() == SymbolType::AngleInternal ||
90 symbolNode->variable().symbolType() == SymbolType::Empty)
91 return;
92
93 if (symbolNode->getQualifier() == EvqGlobal)
94 {
95 TIntermSequence *initCode = CreateInitCode(symbolNode, canUseLoopsToInitialize,
96 highPrecisionSupported, symbolTable);
97 deferredInitializersOut->insert(deferredInitializersOut->end(), initCode->begin(),
98 initCode->end());
99 }
100 }
101}
102
103void InsertInitCallToMain(TIntermBlock *root,
104 TIntermSequence *deferredInitializers,
105 TSymbolTable *symbolTable)
106{
107 TIntermBlock *initGlobalsBlock = new TIntermBlock();
108 initGlobalsBlock->getSequence()->swap(*deferredInitializers);
109
110 TFunction *initGlobalsFunction =
111 new TFunction(symbolTable, kInitGlobalsString, SymbolType::AngleInternal,
112 StaticType::GetBasic<EbtVoid>(), false);
113
114 TIntermFunctionPrototype *initGlobalsFunctionPrototype =
115 CreateInternalFunctionPrototypeNode(*initGlobalsFunction);
116 root->getSequence()->insert(root->getSequence()->begin(), initGlobalsFunctionPrototype);
117 TIntermFunctionDefinition *initGlobalsFunctionDefinition =
118 CreateInternalFunctionDefinitionNode(*initGlobalsFunction, initGlobalsBlock);
119 root->appendStatement(initGlobalsFunctionDefinition);
120
121 TIntermAggregate *initGlobalsCall =
122 TIntermAggregate::CreateFunctionCall(*initGlobalsFunction, new TIntermSequence());
123
124 TIntermBlock *mainBody = FindMainBody(root);
125 mainBody->getSequence()->insert(mainBody->getSequence()->begin(), initGlobalsCall);
126}
127
128} // namespace
129
130bool DeferGlobalInitializers(TCompiler *compiler,
131 TIntermBlock *root,
132 bool initializeUninitializedGlobals,
133 bool canUseLoopsToInitialize,
134 bool highPrecisionSupported,
135 TSymbolTable *symbolTable)
136{
137 TIntermSequence *deferredInitializers = new TIntermSequence();
138 std::vector<const TVariable *> variablesToReplace;
139
140 // Loop over all global statements and process the declarations. This is simpler than using a
141 // traverser.
142 for (TIntermNode *statement : *root->getSequence())
143 {
144 TIntermDeclaration *declaration = statement->getAsDeclarationNode();
145 if (declaration)
146 {
147 GetDeferredInitializers(declaration, initializeUninitializedGlobals,
148 canUseLoopsToInitialize, highPrecisionSupported,
149 deferredInitializers, &variablesToReplace, symbolTable);
150 }
151 }
152
153 // Add the function with initialization and the call to that.
154 if (!deferredInitializers->empty())
155 {
156 InsertInitCallToMain(root, deferredInitializers, symbolTable);
157 }
158
159 // Replace constant variables with non-constant global variables.
160 for (const TVariable *var : variablesToReplace)
161 {
162 TType *replacementType = new TType(var->getType());
163 replacementType->setQualifier(EvqGlobal);
164 TVariable *replacement =
165 new TVariable(symbolTable, var->name(), replacementType, var->symbolType());
166 if (!ReplaceVariable(compiler, root, var, replacement))
167 {
168 return false;
169 }
170 }
171
172 return true;
173}
174
175} // namespace sh
